text: 30-minute confidence level is overstated — zero validation cannot sustain a full talk without drifting into speculative claims
No confirmed CFP scope — reasoning from event name alone is insufficient for confident venue-fit claims
MCP/function-calling objection doesn't kill AXON but sets very high burden of proof — AXON must show measurable gains over MCP+structured outputs+conventions
Track B (methodology) is over-projected as 30-min anchor — agent devs prioritize shipping, not meta-process review
Lightning talk outline is overloaded — 5 minutes cannot fit problem+concept+3 examples+uncertainty+CTA
30-minute structure has zero slack and live debate demo is high-risk and time-volatile
Perception risk is worse than rejection — can pre-bias future reception when real results arrive
Token-count experiment alone doesn't meet burden for 30-minute talk — token compression is not protocol utility
30-minute conditional defense has no hard go/no-go threshold — 'may be achievable' is not a decision criterion
Proposal must front-load epistemic honesty with falsifiable value claim — not 'a better standard' but 'a protocol hypothesis with a working prototype'
